member.name: T:WGetNET.ProcessManager
member.summary: The class provides the winget process execution.

member.name: M:WGetNET.ProcessManager.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the process to execute.

member.name: M:WGetNET.ProcessManager.ExecuteWingetProcess(System.String)
member.summary: Executes a winget process with the given command and returns the result.
member.param: A representing the command that winget should be executed with.
member.returns: A object, containing the output an exit id of the process.

member.name: M:WGetNET.ProcessManager.ExecuteWingetProcessAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronous executes a winget process with the given command and returns the result.
member.param: A representing the command that winget should be executed with.
member.returns: A object, containing the output an exit id of the process.

member.name: M:WGetNET.ProcessManager.GetStartInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the start info for a process.
member.param: String containig the arguments for the action.
member.returns: A object, for the process.

member.name: M:WGetNET.ProcessManager.RunProcess(System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo)
member.summary: Runs a process with the current start informations.
member.returns: A object, containing the output an exit id of the process.

member.name: M:WGetNET.ProcessManager.RunProcessAsync(System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo)
member.summary: Asynchronous runs a process with the current start informations.
member.returns: A object, containing the output an exit id of the process.

member.name: M:WGetNET.ProcessManager.ReadSreamOutput(System.IO.StreamReader)
member.summary: Reads the data from the process output to a string array.
member.param: The with the process output.
member.returns: A array containing the process output stream content by lines.

member.name: M:WGetNET.ProcessManager.ReadSreamOutputAsync(System.IO.StreamReader)
member.summary: Asynchronous reads the data from the process output to a string array.
member.param: The with the process output.
member.returns: A array containing the process output stream content by lines.

member.name: T:WGetNET.WinGetInfo
member.summary: The class offers informations about the installed winget version.

member.summary: Gets if winget is installed on the system.
member.returns: if winget is installed or if not.

member.name: P:WGetNET.WinGetInfo.WinGetVersion
member.summary: Gets the version number of the winget installation.

member.returns: A of instances.

member.name: M:WGetNET.WinGetSourceManager.AddSource(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new source to winget (Needs administrator rights).
member.remarks: The source type is optional but some sources like the "msstore" need it or adding it wil throw an error.
member.param: A representing the name of the source to add.
A representing the source (eg. URL).
member.returns: if the action was succesfull and if it failed.
member.exception: WinGet is not installed or not found on the system.
The current action failed for an unexpected reason. Please see inner exception.
The current user is missing administrator privileges for this call.
